titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Charlie Norwood, a Representative of the State of Georgia.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 159.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/14/2007--Passed House without amendment. Declares that the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the death of the Honorable Charles W. Norwood, Jr., a Representative from Georgia. Declares that when the House adjourns on February 14, 2007, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Representative Norwood.
